name: Space Invaders (itch) (Jeimy RM)
description:
Space Invaders take planet Earth!. Destroy 'em all before it is too late!. 

If you haven't played this classic space shooter game before, now it's 
the time!. I made this game like the arcade version to show modern kids 
the real deal. You can now revive the good old times with this game and 
taking it with you anywhere you want to show your friends.

This game is endless. You can play until you run out of lifes.
I wonder how much you can score in this game?!. ;D
